DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) LAGOS accepts  
a) very good passes in JUPEB/'A' level subjects 
Any three (3) of French, Igbo, Yoruba, CRS, IS, 
History, Government, Literature in English, 
Music and Fine Arts.  
b) two (2) 'A' level/JUPEB passes in Arts or Social 
Sciences or in both.  
c) candidates  must  satisfy  the 
 UTME requirements.  
(ii) OAU - the programme includes one (1) year at the 
French Village, Badagry (for French candidates), 
Germany (for German candidates) and Brazil (for 
Portuguese candidates).  
(iii) UNN accepts  
a) NCE merit in relevant subjects as well as UTME 
requirements.   
b) two (2) GCE ‘A’ level passes or its equivalent 
and three (3)other 'O' level credit passes.  
UTME  
(i)  ‘O’ levelpass in English Language is accepted for 
candidates with distinction in French (except 
OAU).
